title: Navigate forwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Red' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRed value128 orientationHorizontal minimumValue0 maximumValue255

title: Navigate backwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Red' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRed value128 orientationHorizontal minimumValue0 maximumValue255

title: Request information about a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Red' slider, read information about the slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRed value128 orientationHorizontal minimumValue0 maximumValue255

title: Increment a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 129.

title: Decrement a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 127.

title: Increment a slider by ten steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 138.

title: Decrement a slider by ten steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 118.

title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 0.

title: Increment a slider to the maximum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 255.
